Content-Language: ja

--1--

{
  "headers": {
    "subject": {
      "Text": "こんにちは"
    },
    "mime_version": {
      "Text": "1.0"
    },
    "content_type": {
      "ContentType": {
        "c_type": "multipart",
        "c_subtype": "mixed",
        "attributes": {
          "comment": "人権の無視及",
          "boundary": "1"
        }
      }
    }
  },
  "html_body": [
    {
      "contents": "<html><body>人権の無視及</body></html>"
    }
  ],
  "text_body": [
    {
      "headers": {
        "content_transfer_encoding": {
          "Text": "binary"
        },
        "content_type": {
          "ContentType": {
            "c_type": "text",
            "c_subtype": "plain"
          }
        },
        "content_language": {
          "Text": "ja"
